# Fork Media

## Example

```html
<amp-ad
    width="300"
    height="50"
    type="forkmedia"
    data-product="contextads"
    data-format="impulse"
    data-html-access-allowed
>
</amp-ad>
```

## Configuration

For details on the configuration semantics, please contact Fork Media.

### Required parameters

-   `data-product`
-   `data-html-access-allowed`
